段: 風雨聲音擾亂秋夜靜，時常聽見土蚓哮悲情，引阮思鄉毋知雨水冷，自嘆自恨幸福未完成，啊！前途茫茫宛然失光明。

hong-u2 siann-im jiau2-loan7 chhiu-ia7 cheng7, si5-siong5 thiann-kinn3 tou7-un2 hau2 pi-cheng5, in2 goan2 su-hiong m7 chai hou7-chui2 leng2, chu7 than3 chu7 hun7 heng7-hok be7 oan5-seng5, ah! chian5-tou5 bong5-bong5 oan2-jian5 sit kong-beng5.
希望純情結成好鴛鴦，無疑環境阻礙阮自由。秋風夜雨也無替阮想，那通規暝迫阮添憂愁？啊！思思念念一日如三秋。

hi-bong7 sun5-cheng5 kiat-seng5 ho2 oan-iunn, bo5 gi5 khoan5-keng2 chou2-gai7 goan2 chu7-iu5. chhiu-hong ia7-u2 ia7 bo5 thoe3 goan2 siunn7, na2 thang kui-me5 pek goan2 thinn iu-chhiu5? a2! su-su-liam7-liam7 chit8 jit8 ju5 sann chhiu.
風雨淒涼已經是秋分，離開故鄉猶原這時陣，彼時約束望你相信阮，堅心為君保守阮青春，啊！阮是可比海上小帆船。

hong-u2 chhi-liang5 i2-keng si7 chhiu-hun, li7-khui kou3-hiong iu5-goan5 chit si5-chun7, hit-si5 iok-sok bang7 li2 siong-sin3 goan2, kian-sim ui7 kun po2-siu2 goan2 chheng-chhun, ah! goan2 si7 kho2-pi2 hai2-siong7 sio2 phang5-chun5.
秋風吹樹箬落地，一年有一回。分開時咱有約束秋天再相會。天頂的牛郎織女每年七夕有相會，我佮你敢有機會，做陣享受秋風吹。秋風喲秋風啊！請你毋通閣再亂吹。

chhiu-hong chhoe chhiu7-hioh8 loh8 te7, chit8 ni5 u7 chit8 hoe5. hun-khui si5 lan2 u7 iok-sok chhiu-thinn chai3 siong-hoe7. thinn-teng2 e5 gu5-long5 chit-lu2 mui2-ni5 chhit-siah8 u7 siong-hoe7, goa2 kah li2 kam2 u7 ki-hoe7, choe3-tin7 hiang2-siu7 chhiu-hong chhoe. chhiu-hong ioh chhiu-hong ah! chhiann2 li2 m7 thang koh chai3 loan7 chhoe.
秋風冷一陣一陣，吹入我心內。約束的日子過了為何你無來，佇他鄉放我一个孤單寂寞你敢知？你這款無守約束，害我傷心底等待。秋風喲秋風啊！請你替我轉達予伊知。

chhiu-hong leng2 chit8-chun7 chit8-chun7, chhoe jip8 goa2 sim-lai7. iok-sok e5 jit8-chi2 ke3 liau2 ui7-ho5 li2 bo5 lai5, ti7 thann-hiong pang3 goa2 chit8 e5 kou-toann chek8-bok8 li2 kam2 chai? li2 chit khoan2 bo5 siu2 iok-sok, hai7 goa2 siong-sim teh tan2-thai7. chhiu-hong ioh chhiu-hong--ah! chhiann2 li2 the3 goa2 choan2-tat8 hou7 i chai.
秋風吹樹箬落地，一年有一回。分開時咱有約束秋天再相會。天頂的牛郎織女每年七夕有相會，我佮你敢有機會，做陣享受秋風吹。秋風喲秋風啊！請你毋通閣再亂吹。

chhiu-hong chhoe chhiu7-hioh8 loh8 te7, chit8 ni5 u7 chit8 hoe5. hun-khui si5 lan2 u7 iok-sok chhiu-thinn chai3 siong-hoe7. thinn-teng2 e5 gu5-long5 chit-lu2 mui2-ni5 chhit-siah8 u7 siong-hoe7, goa2 kah li2 kam2 u7 ki-hoe7, choe3-tin7 hiang2-siu7 chhiu-hong chhoe. chhiu-hong ioh chhiu-hong ah! chhiann2 li2 m7 thang koh chai3 loan7 chhoe.
佇彼粒山腳有一間紅瓦厝，厝邊縛一隻老水牛，有看著雞鴨無看著囡仔，稀稀微微紅瓦厝。
ti7 hit liap8 soann-kha u7 chit8 keng ang5 hia7-chhu3, chhu3-pinn pak8 chit8 chiah lau7 chui2-gu5, u7 khoann3 tioh8 koe ah bo5 khoann3 tioh8 gin2-a2, hi-hi-bi5-bi5 ang5 hia7-chhu3.
佇彼粒山腳有一間紅瓦厝，厝後放一寡歹農具。過溝的菜園有一對老翁婆，作穡掘甲尻脊痀痀痀。啊！嘿是啥人的序大人，放予伊佇遐做粗重，伊的囝是走佗藏？連孫仔也無來搭相共，孤單的老翁婆，孤單的老翁婆，恁的囝佮恁的孫哦，何時才會轉來七桃。

ti7 hit liap8 soann-kha u7 chit8 keng ang5 hia7-chhu3, chhu3-au7 pang3 chit8 koa2 phainn2 long5-ku7. ke3 kau e5 chhai3-hng5 u7 chit8 tui3 lau7 ang-po5, choh-sit kut8 kah kha-chiah ku-ku-ku. ah! he si7 siann2-lang5 e5 si7-toa7-lang5, pang3 hou7 i ti7 hia cho3 chhou-tang7, i e5 kiann2 si7 chau2 to2 chhang3? lian5 sun-a2 ia7 bo5 lai5 tau3-sann-kang7, kou-toann e5 lau7 ang-po5, kou-toann e5 lau7 ang-po5, lin2 e5 kiann2 kah lin2 e5 sun--ouh, ho5-si5 chiah e7 tng2 lai5 thit-tho5.
佇彼粒山腳有一間紅瓦厝，厝後放一寡歹農具。過溝的菜園有一對老翁婆，作穡掘甲尻脊痀痀痀。啊！嘿是啥人的序大人，放予伊佇遐做粗重，伊的囝是走佗藏？連孫仔也無來搭相共，孤單的老翁婆，孤單的老翁婆，恁的囝佮恁的孫哦，何時才會轉來七桃。

ti7 hit liap8 soann-kha u7 chit8 keng ang5 hia7-chhu3, chhu3-au7 pang3 chit8 koa2 phainn2 long5-ku7. ke3 kau e5 chhai3-hng5 u7 chit8 tui3 lau7 ang-po5, choh-sit kut8 kah kha-chiah ku-ku-ku. ah! he si7 siann2-lang5 e5 si7-toa7-lang5, pang3 hou7 i ti7 hia cho3 chhou-tang7, i e5 kiann2 si7 chau2 to2 chhang3? lian5 sun-a2 ia7 bo5 lai5 tau3-sann-kang7, kou-toann e5 lau7 ang-po5, kou-toann e5 lau7 ang-po5, lin2 e5 kiann2 kah lin2 e5 sun--ouh, ho5-si5 chiah e7 tng2 lai5 thit-tho5.
紅花袂芳，今暗的露水敢會降，人講媠人無媠命，這句話敢有影。傷心入房，日思夜夢的你走佗藏，鏡台內面的彼个人，你因何目箍紅，慢慢梳著阮頭鬃，心情猶原未振動。

ang5 hoe boe7 phang, kim-am3 e5 lou7-chui2 kam2 e7 kang3, lang5 kong2 sui2 lang5 bo5 sui2 mia7, chit ku3 oe7 kam2 u7-iann2. siong-sim jip8 pang5, jit8-su-ia7-bang7 e5 li2 chau2 to2 chhang3, kiann3-tai5 lai7-bin7 e5 hit e5 lang5, li2 in ho5 bak8-khou ang5, ban7-ban7 se tioh8 goan2 thau5-chang, sim-cheng5 iu5-goan5 be7 tin2-tang7.
命運的船隻啊往佗位送，茫茫毋知西抑東，花蕊啊！會望後冬。阮的後冬是一場夢，啊！紅花未芳。
mia7-un7 e5 chun5-chiah ah ong2 to2-ui7 sang3, bang5-bang5 m7 chai sai a2 tang, hoe-lui2-ah! e7 bang7 au7-tang. goan2 e5 au7-tang si7 chit8 tiunn5 bang7, ah! ang5 hoe be7 phang.
雙喜飛出阮心窗，月娘啊！替阮送，希望伊會來入夢，明仔早的新娘衫，阮毋知有偌重，（紅花猶原也未芳）。

siang hi2 poe chhut goan2 sim thang, goeh8-niu5 ah! thoe3 goan2 sang3, hi-bong7 i e7 lai5 jip8 bang7, bin5-a2-chai3 e5 sin-niu5-sann, goan2 m7 chai u7 joa7 tang7,  (ang5 hoe iu5-goan5 ia7 be7 phang) .
含笑梅花叢，奈何無人疼痛。孤單啊！獨守寒冬。任由陣陣露水凍，世情若眠夢，命運袂由在人。多變啊！有時虛空，紅塵路上心沉重。

ham5-chhiau3 moe5-hoe chang5, nai7-ho5 bo5 lang5 thiann3-thang3. kou-toann ah! tok8 siu2 han5-tang. jin7 iu5 chun7-chun7 lou7-chui2 tang3, se3-cheng5 na7 bin5-bang7, mia7-un7 boe7 iu5-chai7 lang5. to-pian3 ah! u7-si5 hi-khang, hong5-tin5 lou7-siang7 sim tim5-tang7.
花蕊無百日紅，世事袂當順希望。功名啊！地位，金錢啊！名利，只是拋空網。畫水啊！空作浪，刺繡花無味清芳，雨水落入河，河水流入江，紅塵終歸空。

hoe-lui2 bo5 pah jit8 ang5, se3-su7 boe7 tang3 sun7 hi-bong7. kong-beng5 ah! te7-ui7, kim-chinn5 ah! mia5-li7, chi2-si7 pha khang bang7. ui7 chui2 ah! khang chok long7, chhi3-siu3-hoe bo5 bi7 chheng-phang, hou7-chui2 loh8 jip8 ho5, ho5-chui2 lau5 jip8 kang, hong5-tin5 chiong kui khang.
含笑梅花叢，奈何無人疼痛。孤單啊！獨守寒冬。任由陣陣露水凍，世情若眠夢，命運袂由在人。多變啊！有時虛空，紅塵路上心沉重。

ham5-chhiau3 moe5-hoe chang5, nai7-ho5 bo5 lang5 thiann3-thang3. kou-toann ah! tok8 siu2 han5-tang. jin7 iu5 chun7-chun7 lou7-chui2 tang3, se3-cheng5 na7 bin5-bang7, mia7-un7 boe7 iu5-chai7 lang5. to-pian3 ah! u7-si5 hi-khang, hong5-tin5 lou7-siang7 sim tim5-tang7.
花蕊無百日紅，世事袂當順希望。功名啊！地位，金錢啊！名利，只是拋空網。畫水啊！空作浪，刺繡花無味清芳，雨水落入河，河水流入江，紅塵終歸空。

hoe-lui2 bo5 pah jit8 ang5, se3-su7 boe7 tang3 sun7 hi-bong7. kong-beng5 ah! te7-ui7, kim-chinn5 ah! mia5-li7, chi2-si7 pha khang bang7. ui7 chui2 ah! khang chok long7, chhi3-siu3-hoe bo5 bi7 chheng-phang, hou7-chui2 loh8 jip8 ho5, ho5-chui2 lau5 jip8 kang, hong5-tin5 chiong kui khang.
毋知是過去光陰一去不回頭，或者是阮的青春故意放水流。毋免同情也毋免來瞭解，生活自己有安排。雖然是親像流星，閃熾的紅塵夢，阮也知一切到尾會來變成空。

m7 chai si7 koe3-khi3 kong-im it khi3 put hoe5-thau5, hek8-chia2 si7 goan2 e5 chheng-chhun kou3-i3 pang3 chui2 lau5. m7 bian2 tong5-cheng5 ia7 m7 bian2 lai5 liau2-kai2, seng-oah8 chu7-ki2 u7 an-pai5. sui-jian5 si7 chhin-chhiunn7 liu5-chhinn, siam2-sih e5 hong5-tin5-bang7, gun2 ia7 chai it-chhe3 kau3 be2 e7 lai5 pian3-seng5 khang.
小小期待和夢中的未來，總是囥佇心肝內。燒酒一杯閣一杯吞落喉，目屎也滴落心肝頭。毋敢對你講出阮的悲哀。怎樣的心情你敢知，世間是一片雲煙，茫茫的大海，我親像船隻行往過去閣過來。毋免同情也毋免來瞭解，生活自己有安排。

sio2 sio2 ki5-thai7 ham7 bang7-tiong e5 bi7-lai5, chong2-si7 khng3 ti7 sim-koann-lai7. sio-chiu2 chit8 poe koh chit8 poe thun loh8 au5, bak8-sai2 ia7 tih loh8 sim-koann-thau5. m7 kann2 tui3 li2 kong2 chhut goan2 e5 pi-ai. chainn2-iunn7 e5 sim-cheng5 li2 kam2 chai, se3-kan si7 chit8 phinn3 hun5-ian, bong5-bong5 e5 toa7-hai2, goa2 chhin-chhiunn7 chun5-chiah kiann5 ong2 koe3--khi3 koh koe3--lai5. m7 bian2 tong5-cheng5 ia7 m7 bian2 lai5 liau2-kai2, seng-oah8 chu7-ki2 u7 an-pai5.
毋知是過去光陰一去不回頭，或者是阮的青春故意放水流。毋免同情也毋免來瞭解，生活自己有安排。雖然是親像流星，閃熾的紅塵夢，阮也知一切到尾會來變成空。

m7 chai si7 koe3-khi3 kong-im it khi3 put hoe5-thau5, hek8-chia2 si7 goan2 e5 chheng-chhun kou3-i3 pang3 chui2 lau5. m7 bian2 tong5-cheng5 ia7 m7 bian2 lai5 liau2-kai2, seng-oah8 chu7-ki2 u7 an-pai5. sui-jian5 si7 chhin-chhiunn7 liu5-chhinn, siam2-sih e5 hong5-tin5-bang7, gun2 ia7 chai it-chhe3 kau3 be2 e7 lai5 pian3-seng5 khang.
小小期待和夢中的未來，總是囥佇心肝內。燒酒一杯閣一杯吞落喉，目屎也滴落心肝頭。毋敢對你講出阮的悲哀。怎樣的心情你敢知，世間是一片雲煙，茫茫的大海，我親像船隻行往過去閣過來。毋免同情也毋免來瞭解，生活自己有安排。

sio2 sio2 ki5-thai7 ham7 bang7-tiong e5 bi7-lai5, chong2-si7 khng3 ti7 sim-koann-lai7. sio-chiu2 chit8 poe koh chit8 poe thun loh8 au5, bak8-sai2 ia7 tih loh8 sim-koann-thau5. m7 kann2 tui3 li2 kong2 chhut goan2 e5 pi-ai. chainn2-iunn7 e5 sim-cheng5 li2 kam2 chai, se3-kan si7 chit8 phinn3 hun5-ian, bong5-bong5 e5 toa7-hai2, goa2 chhin-chhiunn7 chun5-chiah kiann5 ong2 koe3--khi3 koh koe3--lai5. m7 bian2 tong5-cheng5 ia7 m7 bian2 lai5 liau2-kai2, seng-oah8 chu7-ki2 u7 an-pai5.
紅燈青燈照落美麗的街市，我心內愁愁照燈火的閃熾，伊來時去茶房，抑是看電影？手錶愈看愈想等伊心紛紛

ang5-teng chhinn-teng chio3 loh8 bi2-le7 e5 koe-chhi7, goa2 sim-lai7 chhiu5-chhiu5 chiau3 teng-hoe2 e5 siam2-sih, i lai5 si5 khi3 te5-pang5, iah8 si7 khoann3 tian7-iann2? chhiu2-pio2 lu2 khoann3 lu2 siunn7 tan2 i sim hun-hun.
中午休息提出伊予我的信，粉紅的信封面留著芳水味，愈讀是愈感激，對我的熱情，目前也會顯出可愛的笑容。

tiong-ngou2 hiu-sek theh8-chhut i hou7 goa2 e5 sin3, hun2-ang5 e5 sin3 hong-bin7 lau5 tioh8 phang-chui2 bi7, ju2 thak8 si7 lu2 kam2-kek, tui3 goa2 e5 jiat8-cheng5, bok8-chian5 ia7 e7 hian2-chhut kho2-ai3 e5 chhio3-iong5.
可愛妹妹阿帕兜來同住，窗邊栽紅花盆籠裡飼小鳥，早餐時啉咖啡，雞卵泡牛乳，這款計劃敢是新婚的空夢。

kho2-ai3 moe-moe a-pha3-toh lai5 tang5 chu3. thang-pinn chai ang5 hoe-phun5 lang2--nih8 chhi7 siau2-niau2, cha2-chhan-si5 lim ka-pi, koe-nng7 phau3 gu5-leng, chit khoan2 ke3-oe7 kann2 si7 sin-hun e5 khang3-bang7.
紅燈美人敢是你心內無感情？抑是你紅顏多薄命。我已經愛你心堅定，怎樣咱的感情，青燈變紅燈。
ang5-teng bi2-jin5 kann2 si7 li2 sim-lai7 bo5 kam2-cheng5? iah8 si7 li2 hong5-gan5 to pok8-beng7. goa2 i2-keng ai3 li2 sim kian-teng7, chainn2-iunn7 lan2 e5 kam2-cheng5, chhinn-teng pian3 ang5-teng.
紅燈美人你害我心未清，紅燈美人你害我心頭凝，你若對我無感情，為何你燒酒啉未停。你若對我無感情，為何你心肝用手舂。紅燈啊！紅燈，美人啊！美人，請你毋通傷賢揀，才袂耽誤著好前程。

ang5-teng bi2-jin5 li2 hai7 goa2 sim be7 chheng, ang5-teng bi2-jin5 li2 hai7 goa2 sim-thau5 geng5, li2 na7 tui3 goa2 bo5 kam2-cheng5, ui7-ho5 li2 sio-chiu2 lim be7 theng5. li2 na7 tui3 goa2 bo5 kam2-cheng5, ui7-ho5 li2 sim-koann eng7 chhiu2 cheng. ang5-teng--ah! ang5-teng, bi2-jin5-ah! bi2-jin5, chhiann2 li2 m7 thang siunn gau5 keng2, chiah boe7 tam-gou7 tioh8 ho2 chian5-theng5.
敢是你心內無感情，也是你紅顏多薄命，我已經愛你心堅定，怎樣咱的感情，青燈變紅燈。
kann2 si7 li2 sim-lai7 bo5 kam2-cheng5, ia7 si7 li2 hong5-gan5 to pok8-beng7, goa2 i2-keng ai3 li2 sim kian-teng7, chainn2-iunn7 lan2 e5 kam2-cheng5, chhinn-teng pian3 ang5-teng.
紅燈美人你害我心未清，紅燈美人你害我心頭凝，你若對我無感情，為何你燒酒啉未停。你若對我無感情，為何你心肝用手舂。紅燈啊！紅燈，美人啊！美人，請你毋通傷賢揀，才袂耽誤著好前程。

ang5-teng bi2-jin5 li2 hai7 goa2 sim be7 chheng, ang5-teng bi2-jin5 li2 hai7 goa2 sim-thau5 geng5, li2 na7 tui3 goa2 bo5 kam2-cheng5, ui7-ho5 li2 sio-chiu2 lim be7 theng5. li2 na7 tui3 goa2 bo5 kam2-cheng5, ui7-ho5 li2 sim-koann eng7 chhiu2 cheng. ang5-teng--ah! ang5-teng, bi2-jin5-ah! bi2-jin5, chhiann2 li2 m7 thang siunn gau5 keng2, chiah boe7 tam-gou7 tioh8 ho2 chian5-theng5.
紅燈啊！紅燈，美人啊！美人，請你毋通傷賢揀，才袂耽誤著好前程。
ang5-teng--ah! ang5-teng, bi2-jin5-ah! bi2-jin5, chhiann2 li2 m7 thang siunn gau5 keng2, chiah boe7 tam-gou7 tioh8 ho2 chian5-theng5.
霓虹燈閃熾的夜景，照落水面陪海泳。港邊思念你無心情，明明青燈煞來看做是紅燈。毋通啦毋通無情，你的心肝毋通赫絕情，誤會造成不幸，白白來犧牲，請你著原諒佮你相參詳，珍惜五年的感情，啊！回心轉意。港邊的青紅燈，若無你我分未清。

ni5-hong5-teng siam2-sih e5 ia7-keng2, chio3 loh8 chui2-bin7 poe5 hai2-eng2. kang2-pinn su-liam7 li2 bo5 sim-chiann5, beng5-beng5 chhinn-teng soah lai5 khoann3-choe3 si7 ang5-teng. m7-thang--lah m7 thang bo5 cheng5, li2 e5 sim-koann m7 thang hiah choat8-cheng5, gou7-hoe7 cho7-seng5 put-heng7, peh8-peh8 lai5 hi-seng, chhiann2 li2 tioh8 goan5-liong7 kah li2 sio chham-siong5, tin-sioh gou7 ni5 e5 kam2-cheng5, ah! hoe5-sim-choan2-i3. kang2-pinn e5 chhinn-ang5-teng, na7 bo5 li2 goa2 hun be7 chheng.

m7-thang--lah m7 thang bo5 cheng5, li2 e5 sim-koann m7 thang hiah choat8-cheng5, gou7-hoe7 cho7-seng5 put-heng7, peh8-peh8 lai5 hi-seng, chhiann2 li2 tioh8 goan5-liong7 kah li2 sio chham-siong5, tin-sioh gou7 ni5 e5 kam2-cheng5, ah! hoe5-sim-choan2-i3. kang2-pinn e5 chhinn-ang5-teng, na7 bo5 li2 goa2 hun be7 chheng.
毋捌看過即爾媠的小姑娘，生做嘛真古錐，櫻桃的小喙閣真賢講話，迷人的烏色目睭活靈靈。姑娘我想欲請你看電影啉 咖啡，啊！免歹勢啊！免歹勢。予你予你予你予你予你心花開，予你予你予你予你予你心花開。

m7 pat khoann3 ke3 chiah-nih sui2 e5 sio2-kou-niu5, senn-cho3 ma7 chin kou2-chui, eng-tho5 e5 sio2 chhui3 koh chin gau5 kong2-oe7, be5-lang5 e5 ou-sek bak8-chiu oah8-lin3-lin3. kou-niu5 goa2 siunn7 beh chhiann2 li2 khoann3 tian7-iann2 lim ka-pi, ah! bian2 phainn2-se3 ah! bian2 phainn2-se3. hou7 li2 hou7 li2 hou7 li2 hou7 li2 hou7 li2 sim-hoe-khui, hou7 li2 hou7 li2 hou7 li2 hou7 li2 hou7 li2 sim-hoe khui.
毋捌看過即爾媠的小姑娘，生做嘛真可愛，若親像天頂的仙女下凡，我毋捌交過愛人你敢相信。姑娘我想欲請你做我的好伴侶，啊！免歹勢啊！免歹勢，請你請你請你請你請你想看覛，請你請你請你請你請你想看覛。

m7 pat khoann3 ke3 chiah-nih sui2 e5 sio2-kou-niu5, senn-cho3 ma7 chin kho2-ai3, na7 chhin-chhiunn7 thinn-teng2 e5 sian-li2 ha7-hoan5, goa2 m7 bat kau ke3 ai3-jin5 li2 kam2 siong-sin3. kou-niu5 goa2 siunn7 beh chhiann2 li2 choe3 goa2 e5 ho2 phoann7-li7, ah! bian2 phainn2-se3 ah! bian2 phainn2-se3, chhiann2 li2 chhiann2 li2 chhiann2 li2 chhiann2 li2 chhiann2 li2 siunn7 khoann3 mai7, chhiann2 li2 chhiann2 li2 chhiann2 li2 chhiann2 li2 chhiann2 li2 siunn7 khoann3 mai7.
